title: GIPHY Dancing Stickers are all the Hype(r)
description: Mission Make this jazz corn dance across my terminal window whenever I deploy code via Github. Introduction I’ve been using Hyper, a terminal emulator built with Javascript, for a while now and I love it. It’s built with React, which is the same technology that powers the front-end of GIPHY.com. It’s very customizable and, with […]

title: Save sanity and time: Why Clever adds yet another timestamp to our analytics data
